parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance.

parameters.name: AccessLogSwitch
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the access logging feature is enabled. Default value: off. Valid values:

*   **on**: The access logging feature is enabled.
*   **off**: The access logging feature is disabled.

parameters.name: EndpointGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the endpoint group.

parameters.name: EndpointGroupType
parameters.description:
The type of the endpoint group. Valid values: Valid values:

*   **default**
*   **virtual**
*   If you leave this parameter empty, all default and virtual endpoint groups are queried.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Global Accelerator (GA) instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag of the endpoint group.
